# include <iostream>
# include <math.h>
using namespace std;
int checkPrime(int n)
{
	int i,t=sqrt(n);
	for (i=2;i<=t;i++)
	{
		if (n%i==0)
			return 0;
	}
	return 1;
}
int checkPalindrome(int n)
{
	int m,t,num=0;
	m=n;
	while (n>0)
	{
		t=n%10;
		num=num*10 + t;
		n/=10;
	}
	if (num==m)
		return 1;
	else
		return 0;
}
int main()
{
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	while (1)
	{
		if (checkPrime(n)==1)
		{
			if (checkPalindrome(n)==1)
			{
				cout<<n;
				return 0;
			}
		}
		n++;
	}
	return 0;
}
